literal_string "Aiakos: caller is not a maintainer."

addMaintainer(address).details: Adds a maintainer to the whitelist.Only owner of the contract can call this function.

params._maintainerAddress: The address of the maintainer account to add.

amIMaintainer().details: Checks if msg.sender is a whitelisted maintainer.

checkRelease(string,bytes32).details: Checks the release integrity given the input hash.

params._sha256Hash: The integrity hash to compare to valid hash.
params._version: The version of the release to check.

params._requiredNumberOfMaintainers: The required number of maintainers to deploy a release.

deployRelease(string,bytes32).details: Deploys a release. A maintainer add its approval for a specific version of the release.If maintainer is the last to approve, the release is approved definitely and a ReleaseApproved event is emitted.Only whitelisted maintainers can call this function.

params._sha256Hash: The integrity hash(SHA256) of the release.
params._version: The version code of the release.

getRequiredNumberOfMaintainers().details: Returns the required number of maintainers.

isMaintainer(address).details: Checks if an address belongs to a whitelisted maintainers.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
